title: Transfer not letting me log into either region?
body: I transferred my account from LAN to NA and it wont let me log in on NA nor the website. (im on a different login right now). When i try to log in on LAN it says my account is in the process of transferring but its never completing . When i try to log in on NA it says wrong user name or password. help?

replies.body: Everything looks okay to me here over here!  If you're still seeing any issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to take a closer look individually, and reply back asap!
